entry.text: In the heart of Piggy Island, where the emerald-green meadows meet the azure sky, you encounter King Pig. He looks up and exclaims, 'Who's there!'

greet.text: King Pig: Hey, who are you?

name_given.text: King Pig: Ah, {name}! A pleasure to meet you. How's your day shaping up?

im_well.text: King Pig: Excellent! The sun is shining, the birds are singing, and all is well in the kingdom.

im_not_well.text: King Pig: Oh dear, I hope the day takes a turn for the better. Anything I can do to make it brighter?

how_are_you.text:
King Pig: I'm doing well, thanks for asking.

King Pig: I'm a bit busy right now, but I'll talk to you later, okay?

dont_go.text: King Pig: Oh, what do you want to talk about?

love.text:
{name}: King Pig, there's something I've been meaning to tell you.
King Pig: Oh? What is it, {name}?

express_feelings.text: {name}: I've come to realize that I care about you more than I initially thought. You make my days brighter.

kingpig_feelings.text: King Pig: {name}, I must admit, you've brought joy to my kingdom. I value our time together.

sunset.text: As the sun sets, casting a warm glow over Piggy Island, you and King Pig meet near the golden fields.

embrace.text: You gently embrace King Pig, feeling a warmth in your heart. The world seems to fade away as you share a tender moment.

hold_hands.text: You and King Pig hold hands, fingers intertwined. There's a magical connection between you two as you enjoy the beauty of the sunset.

kiss.text: Under the canvas of stars, you and King Pig share a magical kiss, sealing your love for each other.

continue_moment.text: The kiss deepens, and time seems to stand still. King Pig pulls you closer, and the world around you becomes a blur.

reflect_kiss.text:
{name}: That kiss was truly magical.
King Pig: {name}, it was. I've never felt such a connection before.

whisper_promises.text:
{name}: King Pig, I promise to stand by your side, through good times and bad.
King Pig: {name}, I promise to cherish you always.

bask_moment.text: You and King Pig bask in the afterglow of the kiss, savoring the intimacy of the moment.

seal_kiss.text: As you seal your promises with another kiss, you feel a bond that transcends words. The night unfolds as a celebration of your newfound love.

express_love.text:
{name}: King Pig, I love you more than words can express.
King Pig: {name}, I feel the same way. You've captured my heart completely.

stay_friends.text: King Pig: I value our friendship, {name}. Let's continue to share moments together.

keep_silent.text: {name}: Maybe some things are better left unsaid. Let's cherish our friendship.
